properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 2 at 5:54PM PST until March 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Areas of north to northeast winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts
up to 45 mph expected. Local gusts to around 55 mph are possible
in the foothills near Altadena, Pasadena and Sierra Madre.

* WHERE...San Gabriel Valley.

* WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and
make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will likely occur in
the foothills near Altadena, Pasadena and Sierra Madre. Major
roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include the
2, 134 and 210 freeways.
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY
